jenes.algorithms

Class IslandGA<T extends Chromosome>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.GeneticAlgorithm<T>
      • jenes.algorithms.IslandGA<T>

  • public class IslandGA<T extends Chromosome>
extends GeneticAlgorithm<T>
    IslandGA implements a niche based algorithm
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  IslandGA.Graph
      The Graph represent the paths between islands in the algorithm landscape

      • setBiggerIsBetter

        public void setBiggerIsBetter(boolean flag)
        Description copied from class: GeneticAlgorithm
        Sets the algorithm's body objective to maximize (true) or minimize (false) the individual fitness. All stages belonging to the body sequence are recursevely set according to the flag.

        Overrides:
        setBiggerIsBetter in class GeneticAlgorithm<T extends Chromosome>
        Parameters:
        flag - true to set the body to maximize the fitness, false to minimize
